description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by November 29th, 2023 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
tags: Laboratory freeze dryers and lyopholizers and accessories
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement ### H4084-233992: PR8898 Freeze Dryer #### Request for Proposal ##### Competitive Tender Process We are seeking a qualified contractor to supply one laboratory freeze dryer to the Department of Health Canada. The contract value is not specified. The delivery location is Ottawa, Ontario, with the system to be received on or before March 28, 2024. #### Details of the Proposal * **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open bidding * **Evaluation Criteria**: Lowest Price * **Start Date**: As soon as possible after contract award * **End Date**: One year after delivery and acceptance * **Location**: Ottawa, Ontario #### Submission Requirements * Proposals must be submitted on or before November 29, 2023, at 14:00 EST. * Late proposals will be declared non-responsive. * The successful bidder will be required to deliver the freeze dryer to Ottawa, Ontario, on or before March 28, 2024. #### Contact Information * Nadine Brazeau (SPAC/PSPC) * Email: [nadine.brazeau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nadine.brazeau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) * Phone: Not available * Fax: Not available #### Related Information The related URL for the tender is [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17978618?extsite=MTc5Nzg2MThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17978618?extsite=MTc5Nzg2MThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). . Please submit any inquiries or proposals on time, and enjoy your huge contribution to the national health system! the successful vendor. the deliverables.">" 3110
